thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 3 of 41
thread.title: Cassandra

author: Cassandra
title: Cassandra
text: The gentleman who helped me set up my accout was amazing! I was frustrated because I had just called and been told by someone who is in partner with direct tv (I believe the same company) that service was not offered in my area after I had done been told by a direct tv rep that it was. He really turned things around. I love how up beat and positive he was!! He really done an amazing job!!! More sales reps should be like him and take notes!!! Great job!!!
